      • turnDirection

        public static int turnDirection(Point p,
                                Point q,
                                Point r)
        Returns the turning direction of a turning of given three points. The turn begins in the point p, then goes to q and finally ends in the point p.
        Parameters:
        p - A point. The origin of a turning.
        q - A point. The point where the trayectory changes its direction.
        r - A point. The end of the turning.
        Returns:
        Point.COLINEARS if the three points is colinear. Point.LEFT if the turning direction is left, Point.RIGHT otherwise.

      • rotatePoint

        public static Point rotatePoint(double angle,
                                Point p)
        Creates a new point before using an angle rotation, relative to the origin.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle the point will rotate. The angle is given in degrees.
        p - The point that rotates.
        Returns:
        The rotated point.
